name: Poofers Poofected - Cogatadish
text: This card cannot be Xyz Summoned. You can banish 1 each of "Poofers Poofected - Dish", "Poofers Poofected - Cog", and "Poofers Poofected - Fat" you control or in your GY to Special Summon this card from your Extra Deck. You can only Special Summon "Poofers Poofected - Cogatadish" once per turn this way. This card can attack directly. Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card. Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can shuffle 3 "Poofers Poofected" monsters that are banished into the Extra Deck, and if you do, this card cannot be targeted or destroyed by your opponentâ€™s card effects until the end of the next turn.
